narrative.narrative: Arke started as Arkefly back in 2005. Its first flight was the 22th of april 2005. Arke is part of TUI Airlines. Currently Arke is a charter company which performs flights to mostly sunny destinations from Amsterdam, Eelde, Rotterdam and Eindhoven. Its current fleet exists of 5 Boeing 737-800, 2 Boeing 767-300ER but 1 of them will leave the fleet in april 2015 and 3 Boeing 787-8 Dreamliners. The last one of the Dreamliners is expected to join the fleet in march 2015
